thread.title: Dulquer posts Charlie pics!
thread.title_full: Dulquer posts Charlie pics! - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Dulquer posts Charlie pics!
text:
Dulquer has been a trendsetter, when it comes to sporting stylish looks on screen. The snap of his Charlie beard has been an online sensation.
Dulquer posted a picture of Charlie and Tessa, played by Dulquer and Parvathy, in which he is seen in a rugged avatar.
Parvathy and Dulquer were earlier seen in Bangalore Days. After ABCD, this is the second film Dulquer and Martin Prakkat will be teaming up for.
